sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the sustained release effect of Huangyangning Sustained-Released Tablets (HSRT).

sentences.chinese: 目的觀察滅蚴寧治療蠕形蟎病的效果及安全性。

sentences.english: Coincidentally, Li Fuxiu and Chen Zhongqiang met literature Ning, also from the chase after.

sentences.english: The exact site at which clonidine exerts this central effect is not precisely known.

sentences.english: Effects of different numerical techniques on phenetic classification of Mosla complex (Labiatae) at population level.

sentences.english: Better to die in truth than live in compromise.

sentences.english: Haig at my request told Dobrynin about the status of our negotiations.
sentences.chinese: 應我的要求，黑格向多勃雷寧介紹談判情況。

sentences.english: In other words, these two disputing regulations would be better abolished as soon as possible.
sentences.chinese: 換言之，這兩項爭議的規定，寧及早廢止爲宜。

sentences.english: Better to be safe, not sorry.
Prof Cronin believes that creating inorganic life it is entirely feasible.
